itunes:title: Episode 353 - Special Guest Patrick Gordon: The Brosman Winner 2018
title: Episode 353 - Special Guest Patrick Gordon: The Brosman Winner 2018
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: With only weeks left to live, we sit down with long time Drinkin' Bro Patrick Gordon as he talks about his life, dealing with terminal cancer, and what he's learned during his short time here on this earth. This is the first time our audience has unanimo...
itunes:summary:
With only weeks left to live, we sit down with long time Drinkin' Bro Patrick Gordon as he talks about his life, dealing with terminal cancer, and what he's learned during his short time here on this earth. This is the first time our audience has unanimously voted for the same individual for Brosman Of The Year and we couldn't have imagined a more deserving person. Patrick is an inspiring guy with an amazing spirit.
